query: How to fix a broken phone?
final_response:
Following are steps to fix steps to fix your cracked phone screen:

1. Power off the device completely
2. Remove the back cover carefully
3. Disconnect the battery connector
4. Remove the old screen assembly
5. Install the new screen assembly
6. Reassemble the device
7. Test the device to ensure it works properly

Tools needed:
1. Phillips screwdriver
2. Plastic pry tool
3. Anti-static wrist strap
4. Work mat

Materials needed:
1. Replacement screen
2. New adhesive
3. Suction cups

Sources:
1. https://www.wikihow.com/Fix-an-iPhone-Screen
